english.segment1: Somewhere between the hot and the cold. Somewhere between the new and the old. Somewhere between who I am and who I used to be. Somewhere in the middle you'll find me
english.segment2: Somewhere between the wrong and the right. Somewhere between the darkness and the light. Somewhere between who I was and who you're making me. Somewhere in the middle you'll find me
english.segment3: Just how close can I get Lord to my surrender. Without losing all control
english.segment4: Fearless warriors in the picket fence. Reckless abandon wrapped in common sense. Deep water faith in the shallow end. We are caught in the middle
english.segment5: With eyes wide open to the differences. The God we want and the God who is. But will we trade our dreams for his. Or are we caught in the middle. Are we caught in the middle
